basic.title: No Input
basic.description: An action with no inputs, fires an event

single.title: Single Input
single.description: An action with a single, non-object input

multiple.title: Multiple Inputs
multiple.description: An action with mutiple, optional inputs

advanced.title: Advanced Inputs
advanced.description: An action with many inputs, some required

virtualEvent.description: An event from a virtual thing

alarmEvent.description: An alarm event from a virtual thing
